body.name: JAMFLY 79" Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch, L-Shaped Couch with Linen Fabric, Small Sectional Sofa with Chaise for Living Room, Dark Gray
features: Convertible Sectional Sofa: This small reversible sectional sofa with a movable ottoman, you can place the ottoman according to your house and preferences.Our sectional sofa can provide comfort and support for years to come, with soft cushions and a reinforced back, eases the rebound, perfect fits for your body, and will not make people feel tired after long-term use. Weight capacity: 660 lbs.

Upgrade Details: This sofa fabric is 100% polyester, washable and stretchable, thicker than other products in the market; The use of sponges with higher density than other products and thicker seat springs, so that the resilience of the sofa can be better; Sofa frame adopts multi-layer solid wood splint and solid wood combination, more durable;The seat cushions and back cushions are removable with zippers on them; Sports Velcro at the bottom of the cushions can also avoid slipping when seated.

Couches for Living Room Set: The sectional couch size is 78.7"(L)*53"(W)*33"(H) which is space saving, perfect for small space like living room, college dorm, home office, and more.If you are looking for a l shaped couch for your small space, this sectional couch will be perfect for you.

Easy Assembly: With easy-to-follow instructions, anyone can easily install the sectional sofa within 10 minutes. No extra tools are needed. The vacuum-packed cushion will be restored to its original state without wrinkles after unpacking.PLEASE NOTE：For ease of transport, some cushions are packed at the bottom of other parts.

After-Sale: The sofa comes with 2 boxes, may be delivered at different times. If there are any questions about the 2nd tracking number or the product, please feel free to contact us, we will respond to you in 24 hours.CONTACT US: Login to your amazon account > choose "Your orders"> find the order ID > click "Contact seller".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s great for an apartment or for small spaces! It’s not too big, but it’s comfy! The grey color is very nice too. It was very easy to assemble also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars On the Fence...
reviews.reviewText: I have a pretty small living room and not a huge budget. I knew I was taking a risk ordering such a cheap couch and its fine. There's nothing great about it but nothing bad either. Assembly was really quick and easy, I did it myself in about 10 minutes. The back cushions are really thin and you can feel the back board but I stuffed them with some polyfill and that helped a lot. It's smaller than I expected as well, the seats aren't very deep so if you're tall that might be an issue. Overall, its a good couch for the price, but extremely mediocre in comparison to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it, small and cute!
reviews.reviewText: I love this purchase! I thought it was such a simple build. It is very comfortable. It is kind of a small size couch with a full size couch diameter. So, for tall or heavier people it might feel like sitting on a big floor pillow because the furniture is kind of short. I got the couch in grey! Absolutely compliments the set up I have and is easy to clean. Easy to readjust. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mundane "Get What You Paid For" Type Deal
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't say there is anything outstanding or unique about this couch. It definitely is for small places on a tight budget, and you'll get what you paid for. Although the amount for this couch in total is a little less than a paycheck for me, it is below average for the couch market (at least from what I can see). So I guess "You get what you paid for" has to be entirely subjective in this circumstance. I do like the light khaki color of the couch that was exactly as it was described and expected, and it was by far the easiest thing I put together in my new place. However, the seats are pretty small, small enough that I find myself more comfortable sitting on the area rug I've placed beneath the couch, using it as a backrest. Not to say that I can't sit on them, but it doesn't feel as comfortable as most couches I've experienced in my life. The whole "sectional" thing tripped me up, and I didn't expect that an ottoman would be attached to the main couch to make up the "sectional" part advertised. That was my fault for not paying attention and not the seller. I wasn't disappointed in that part anyways since the ottoman never strays away from the main couch since it is velcroed together. Overall, if there is one thing I learned from buying furniture for the first time, just spend the money on the thing you actually want instead of settling for the low-end stuff. If you really don't care about what couch you get, sure, get this one. But if you don't want to just tolerate your couch and actually love it, I would look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect little couch! Super easy to put together. I can never put stuff together but this was done in 30 minutes. To be honest, it was bigger than I expected because they were some reviews saying how small it was. I am 55 and fit very comfortably on the couch. I wanted something inexpensive for my front sunroom and didn’t really want patio furniture. This was perfect. Absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy it. Super uncomfortable & No full refunds
reviews.reviewText: This couch is very poorly made and is extremely small! I am 5’1 and this couch comes up a little above my hips. The legs are plastic and the pillows are all different sizes. My 5’8 husband looks like a giant on this tiny couch. All of the pillow packaging came in an air tight bags completely squished to fit in the box. Once opening the box and seeing the bad quality of the product and size, I attempted to start a return but then the seller told me it needed to be in the original packaging and I would have to pay $100 for the item to be shipped back to them. The box was incredibly small and unless you’re gonna airtight the pillows and all again, it’s not going to fit in the box again. Its extremely disappointing and I wish I had never thrown my money away like this especially in a time of moving! Invest in better quality couches if you can or go somewhere else. This is not it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far good value for price
reviews.reviewText: After recently moving long distance I was in need of living room seating with room for myself & 2 boys, but the budget was tight. I scoped Craigslist & FB marketplace but not only were most of the offerings not to my taste (plus the potential concerns of cleanliness/odors), but I have no way of moving a large piece of furniture by myself, so I decided to bite the bullet and order something that could be delivered.I looked at several options for the L shape design I wanted, and was hoping for one with storage in the ottoman and/or sleeper option, but those options alone doubled/tripled the price point, so I passed on them. Of the remaining sofas this one had the highest rating for comfort with a large number of reviews, as well as being affordable. This was super important to me due to chronic pain issues. The manufacturer’s description specifically noted a thicker cushion and spring base, which both suggested actual functional comfort.The sofa arrived in two large but manageable boxes very quickly. The parts assemble easily via v shaped brackets already mounted on the various components that slide into each other. There was only one piece of hardware: a metal plate with two bolts that bridges the two back pieces. The legs are black plastic cones that screw straight in; they seem rather lightweight but easily replaceable if so desired. Altogether it took may 15 minutes to unpack & assemble. One thing I was a little disappointed to see is that the springs in the base pieces were flat, s shape springs that lay horizontal, as opposed to vertical coil shape springs which is what I imagined. The cushions were all the vacuum sealed foam that is common now, and quickly inflated when packaging was opened. Another detail that is a little concerning is the upholstery fabric appears on the thin side, a sort of synthetic velour which I am thinking will not wear well (I am hoping it doesn’t easily tear). One detail I was pleasantly surprised by was that the pillow covers not only unzip for cleaning, but they also came with a Velcro strip along the length of them to stabilize them. This has been one of the drawbacks I previously observed with sectional furniture is cushions/components that slide apart, so between the brackets and the Velcro, once the sofa is assembled it feels stable & secure.The important part- comfort. The cushions are pleasantly firm, but not hard. The back cushions are soft, and extend well over the back rest, which is good because the backrest (and armrests) have virtually no padding. You will definitely need a couple of throw pillows for lounging/comfortable TV watching. So far my sons & I have all sat comfortably together and are enjoying it. Overall I would safely give it a 4 star rating; my biggest concern is it’s durability. I will come back in the future and adjust my score accordingly, but as of right now I am pleased with the purchase & value.
